org.drip.analytics.period
Class Period

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.analytics.period.Period
Direct Known Subclasses:
CouponPeriod, ProductCouponPeriodCurveMeasures, ProductLossPeriodCurveMeasures
public class Period
extends Serializer

This class serves as a holder for the period dates: period start/end, period accrual start/end, pay, and full period day count fraction.
